1.0.3.en: Refresh status from fancoil every 5 minutes

1.0.5.en: Added sensors with state of different temperatures, fan, mode and alarm

1.0.6.en: Added scheduling onoff capability, update sensor states and added sensor icons

1.2.0.en: Added possibility to add fancoils through IP address if none was found by MAC address

1.3.0.en: Added flow cards for thermostat mode and fan speed
